languages.text: "Не лучше ли направить пламя наших душ на свершение достойных деяний, нежели ссоры с собратьями?" {n}Эклендиль взмахивает руками, изображая несколько неизвестных жестов в воздухе, и Муаран с Ирлиэт смиренно затихают.{/n} "Я вижу, собрат Муаран, нечто тревожит твое хрупкое сердце. Поведай же нам с Изгоем о своих переживаниях, а истину о судьбе Крудараха я раскрою тебе чуть позже".
languages.translation_comment: если игрок сбежал из Комморры с фарсиром Эклендилем

traits.locale_text: "Не лучше ли направить пламя наших душ на свершение достойных деяний, нежели ссоры с собратьями?" {n}Эклендиль взмахивает руками, изображая несколько неизвестных жестов в воздухе, и Муаран с Ирлиэт смиренно затихают.{/n} "Я вижу, собрат Муаран, нечто тревожит твое хрупкое сердце. Поведай же нам с Изгоем о своих переживаниях, а истину о судьбе Крудараха я раскрою тебе чуть позже".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed toward worthy deeds than arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall into cowed silence.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."
languages.original_text: "Не лучше ли направить пламя наших душ на свершение достойных деяний, нежели ссоры с собратьями?" {n}Эклендиль взмахивает руками, изображая несколько неизвестных жестов в воздухе, и Муаран с Ирлиэт смиренно затихают.{/n} "Я вижу, собрат Муаран, нечто тревожит твое хрупкое сердце. Поведай же нам с Изгоем о своих переживаниях, а истину о судьбе Крудараха я раскрою тебе чуть позже".

traits.locale_text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed at worthy deeds than at arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall silent sheepishly.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."

Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “难道我们灵魂的火焰，真的要用来与亲族争论吗？难道不应该做些更有价值的事情吗？”{n}埃克伦迪在空中挥舞着双手，做了几个意义不明的手势。随后，穆兰与伊莉耶特羞愧地沉默下来。{/n}“我看得出来，有什么事情在困扰着你纤细的心灵，我的亲族穆兰。既然如此，把你的烦恼告诉我和流浪者吧，我稍后会告诉你克鲁达拉赫陨落的真相。”
languages.original_text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed toward worthy deeds than arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall into cowed silence.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."

traits.locale_text: “难道我们灵魂的火焰，真的要用来与亲族争论吗？难道不应该做些更有价值的事情吗？”{n}埃克伦迪在空中挥舞着双手，做了几个意义不明的手势。随后，穆兰与伊莉耶特羞愧地沉默下来。{/n}“我看得出来，有什么事情在困扰着你纤细的心灵，我的亲族穆兰。既然如此，把你的烦恼告诉我和流浪者吧，我稍后会告诉你克鲁达拉赫陨落的真相。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Sollten wir das Feuer unserer Seelen nicht besser in würdige Taten lenken denn in einen Streit mit unserem eigenen Volk?" {n}Eklendyl führt mit den Händen mehrere Gesten von unbekannter Bedeutung aus. Muaran und Yrliet verstummen eingeschüchtert.{/n} "Ich kann sehen, dass etwas Euer delikates Herz belastet, mein Bruder Muaran. Teilt mir und der Ausgestoßenen Eure Gefühle mit, dann werde ich Euch etwas später die Wahrheit über Crudarachs Schicksal offenbaren."
languages.original_text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed toward worthy deeds than arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall into cowed silence.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."

traits.locale_text: "Sollten wir das Feuer unserer Seelen nicht besser in würdige Taten lenken denn in einen Streit mit unserem eigenen Volk?" {n}Eklendyl führt mit den Händen mehrere Gesten von unbekannter Bedeutung aus. Muaran und Yrliet verstummen betreten.{/n} "Ich kann sehen, dass etwas Euer delikates Herz belastet, mein Bruder Muaran. Teilt mir und der Ausgestoßenen Eure Gefühle mit, dann werde ich Euch etwas später die Wahrheit über Crudarachs Schicksal offenbaren."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿Y no es mejor dirigir el fuego de nuestras almas hacia causas dignas en vez de discutir entre nosotros?». {n}Eklendyl agita las manos en el aire, realizando diversos gestos cuyo significado desconoces. Muaran e Yrliet guardan silencio, avergonzados.{/n} «Muaran, hermano mío, veo que algo atribula tu delicado corazón. Comparte tus sentimientos conmigo y con la proscrita, que después yo te revelaré la verdad sobre el destino de Crudarach».
languages.original_text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed toward worthy deeds than arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall into cowed silence.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y no es mejor dirigir el fuego de nuestras almas hacia causas dignas en vez de discutir entre nosotros?». {n}Eklendyl agita las manos en el aire, realizando diversos gestos cuyo significado desconoces. Muaran e Yrliet guardan silencio, avergonzados.{/n} «Muaran, hermano mío, veo que algo atribula tu delicado corazón. Comparte tus sentimientos conmigo y con la proscrita, que después yo te revelaré la verdad sobre el destino de Crudarach».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Le feu de nos âmes ne serait-il pas mieux employé à accomplir de bonnes actions plutôt qu'à se disputer entre nous ? » {n}Eklendyl agite les mains en l'air. La signification de ses gestes vous est inconnue, mais Muaran et Yrliet se taisent aussitôt.{/n} « Je vois que quelque chose trouble votre cœur délicat, mon cher Muaran. Je vous invite à vous confier à l'Errante et à moi-même ; plus tard, je vous révélerai le véritable sort de Crudarach. »
languages.original_text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed toward worthy deeds than arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall into cowed silence.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."

traits.locale_text: « Le feu de nos âmes ne serait-il pas mieux employé à accomplir de bonnes actions plutôt qu'à se disputer entre nous ? » {n}Eklendyl agite les mains en l'air. La signification de ses gestes vous est inconnue, mais Muaran et Yrliet se taisent aussitôt, l'air penaud.{/n} « Je vois que quelque chose trouble votre cœur délicat, mon cher Muaran. Je vous invite à vous confier à l'Errante et à moi-même ; plus tard, je vous révélerai le véritable sort de Crudarach. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「我々の魂の炎は、同胞と言い争うよりも、立派な行いに向けた方が良いのではないか？」{n}エクレンディルは両手を宙に振り、いくつか意味不明のジェスチャーをした。ムアランとユリエットはバツが悪そうに黙ってしまう。{/n}「あなたの繊細な心に何か悩みがあるようだな、我が同胞ムアラン。私と追放者とともに気持ちを分かちあおう。そうすれば、もう少し後にクルダラの運命の真実を教えよう」
languages.original_text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed toward worthy deeds than arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall into cowed silence.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の魂の炎は、同胞と言い争うよりも、立派な行いに向けた方が良いのではないか？」{n}エクレンディルは両手を宙に振り、いくつか意味不明のジェスチャーをした。ムアランとユリエットはバツが悪そうに黙ってしまう。{/n}「あなたの繊細な心に何か悩みがあるようだな、我が同胞ムアラン。私と追放者とともに気持ちを分かちあおう。そうすれば、もう少し後にクルダラの運命の真実を教えよう」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ruhlarımızın alevi, soydaşlarımızla takışmak yerine faydalı işler için parlasa fena mı olur?" {n}Eklendyl, ellerini sallıyor. Anlamını bilmediğin bazı hareketler yapıyor. Muaran ve Yrliet, sessizliğe gömülüyor.{/n} "O hassas kalbini acıtan bir şeyler var, görüyorum soydaşım Muaran. Gel, içini bana ve Yurtsuz'a dök madem. Ben de Crudarach'a olanların ardındaki hakikati paylaşayım."
languages.original_text: "Is the fire of our souls not better directed toward worthy deeds than arguing with our kin?" {n}Eklendyl waves his hands in the air, making several gestures of unknown meaning. Muaran and Yrliet fall into cowed silence.{/n} "I can see that something is troubling your delicate heart, my kinsman Muaran. Share your feelings with me and the Outcast then, and I will reveal the truth of Crudarach's fate to you a little later."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhlarımızın alevi, soydaşlarımızla takışmak yerine faydalı işler için parlasa fena mı olur?" {n}Eklendyl, ellerini sallıyor. Anlamını bilmediğin bazı hareketler yapıyor. Muaran ve Yrliet, sessizliğe gömülüyor.{/n} "O hassas kalbini acıtan bir şeyler var, görüyorum soydaşım Muaran. Gel, içini bana ve Yurtsuz'a dök madem. Ben de Crudarach'a olanların ardındaki hakikati paylaşayım."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
